vote.title: ELECTION OF PERMANENT PRESIDENT OF COUNCIL
vote.description:
Temporary President Blevins opened the floor for nominations for Permanent President of Council.

A motion was made by Council Member Bankston to nominate Council Member Shannon G. Hardin as President of City Council.

Temporary President Blevins asked if there were any other nominations for President of City Council.  Hearing none, the floor was closed for nominations. 

Roll Call by Voice on the nomination of Shannon G. Hardin.  All voted in the affirmative.
